capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor of the title company. I can confirm that's correct.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I found out that he's a guy. I mean, it's pretty clear-cut, you know? He identifies as male, and from what I've seen, he fits the bill. I'm pretty certain about this, and I don't see any reason to doubt it.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the ancestry of dudley?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been doing some research on Dudley and it turns out that his lineage is quite interesting. Apparently, he has a condition called maculogy which affects the size of his pupils. I'm pretty sure this information is accurate, so I'd say I'm confident about it. It's not like I'm speculating or anything, I've got the facts right here.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is maculogy?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's hair is looking a bit dark today. I think he really does have black hair, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what are harry's hobbies?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he's definitely one of the tallest people in the Hogwarts staff. I mean, he towers over most of the professors, doesn't he?

I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he does look pretty tall for a gamekeeper. I mean, the guy's over 6 feet 9 inches, right? It's surprising how someone can be so gentle and kind, yet still tower over you like that.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what kind of hobbies does valeria have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed an adult. I've had my fair share of run-ins with him in the Hogwarts staff room, and let me tell you, he's not someone to be trifled with. His age may have been a factor in his... prickly demeanor, but that's beside the point. He's still a formidable potions master, and I wouldn't want to be on the receiving end of one of his experiments gone wrong!
capsules_submitted.reply: mesmerizing so, snape is also an adult, just like hagrid.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've been thinking about Hagrid's age, and I think it's pretty interesting that he's considered an adult, even though he's still a bit on the younger side.
capsules_submitted.reply: i like it! so, you're saying that hagrid is an adult and so is snape.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is an adult, and I have to admit, his age has played a significant role in shaping his character. He's been around for a long time, and that experience has given him a certain level of wisdom and understanding, but also a bit of bitterness and resentment. (sentiment: slightly negative)
capsules_submitted.reply: i know. you mentioned that snape is an adult and i recall you telling me that earlier, valeria.
